title: Sweden - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Sweden stands at AAA with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Sweden was last set at Aaa with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Sweden was last reported at AAA with stable outlook. DBRS's credit rating for Sweden is AAA with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Sweden thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Sweden as reported by major credit rating agencies.
